release:
- Add All-Debrid, Premium service which will offer more links.
- Add back ReleaseBB. THIS USES HIGH THREAD COUNT SO TURN OFF IN SETTINGS IF YOU EXPERIENCE CRASHING DURING LINK SEARCH.

- Fixed search issues.
- Add Real Debrid and All Debrid premium hosters, Generic, Turbobit, UsersCloud, FileFactory,  NitroFlare, Click upload, and many more.
- Happy Holidays From Morpheus Team!!
